d2dd6947e1e6.title: When States control things that can affect another State is why we NEED Federal laws or Regulations…

paragraphs.text: When States control things that can affect another State is why we NEED Federal laws or Regulations to even the playing field and have common guidelines. Some States do a great job, while others eager for income let companies do almost anything taking dangerous shortcuts that endanger everyone.

paragraphs.text: Well golly, isn’t Oklahoma a red state? Why, so it is. It’s entirely run by conservative Republicans!
paragraphs.name: af4b

paragraphs.text: Gee, maybe Oklahoman voters should stop voting in so many conservative politicians! If the Dems had a lick of sense, we’d be seeing ads and billboards saying, “Like Clean Water? Vote Democrat!” all over the state.

910628cdde94.title: I have been following the fracking controversy — not that diligently, I confess — and so far have…

paragraphs.text: I have been following the fracking controversy — not that diligently, I confess — and so far have felt that the evidence is too weak to justify stronger regulatory action. This is largely because the amount of data available has been insufficient. So far, most of the arguments in favor of greater regulatory restrictions have been precautionary in…
